subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de Suisse (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Peter Sagan tied a Tour de Suisse record with his 11th career stage win in the 82-year-old race, and Thibaut Pinot retained the overall lead.
snippet: Peter Sagan tied a Tour de Suisse record with his 11th career stage win in the 82-year-old race, and Thibaut Pinot retained the overall lead.
